links.title: Market Sets Up For An Action-Reaction Collision
links.description: When a collision happens between two equal and opposite forces, one object gains in momentum, while the other object loses momentum. Certain stocks like Apple gained momentum with a record for market cap and a 2018 high. Other stocks lost momentum.

links.title: One Trillion...
links.description: A week doesn't go by without some type of significant cannabis related news. This week Molson Coors (TAP) teamed up with Hydropothecary (HEXO.TO) announcing a joint venture to develop cannabis-infused, non-alcoholic beverages. This deal will be extremely important heading into "part 2" of cannabis legalization when in 2019 consumable cannabis products become legal.

messages.body: Great from @om 's blog now writing daily again on $aapl and time being on their side https://om.co/2018/08/02/time-is-on-apples-side/

links.title: Time is on Apple's side
links.description: Since the ancient Egyptians and their sundials, we humans have been fascinated with the idea of measuring "time". And our reasons for measuring time often inform the design of tools we use to track it. For instance, during the dark ages, clocks were essentially used for religious purposes and found place on top of towers.

messages.body: $TSM $AAPL $QCOM  Computer Virus Cripples IPhone Chipmaker TSMC Plants  https://www.bloombergquint.com/technology/2018/08/04/tsmc-takes-emergency-steps-as-operations-hit-by-computer-virus#gs.8yVSsJo

links.title: Computer Virus Cripples IPhone Chipmaker TSMC Plants
links.description: It's unclear who targeted TSMC, the world's biggest contract manufacturer of chips for companies including Apple and Qualcomm Inc. It's the first time a virus had ever brought down a TSMC facility, recalling the WannaCry cyberattacks of 2017 that forced corporations around the world to suspend operations as they rooted out the ransomware.

message.body: Apple's Q3 Was Disappointment-Free, Says Piper Jaffray https://benzinga.com/z/12121444 $AAPL

links.title: Apple's Q3 Was Disappointment-Free, Says Piper Jaffray (NASDAQ:AAPL)
links.description: Wall Street analysts, investors and customers all seem to share enthusiasm for Apple, Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL)'s third-quarter report. Piper Jaffray analyst Mike Olson reiterated an Overweight rating on Apple and raised the price target from $214 to $218. He commented on the company's Q3 on Benzinga's PreMarket Prep morning show this week.

messages.body: Changing Of The Guard Or Is There Value In Value? $QQQ $AAPL $FXI $IWM https://t.co/kPGQ6pmLov

links.title: Changing Of The Guard Or Is There Value In Value?
links.description: The most interesting theme is that value stocks look to be emerging from a decade-long slumber versus growth. This rotation could be a long anticipated resurgence, not surprising as many stalwarts of growth have recently thrown in the towel.
